column4: You may check if you have "Visual Effects" disabled in the "Appearance"-preferences. I had the same effect on 9.10 and the reason was that the effects were disabled.

Mrokii, I don't believe I killed the window manager...if I did, I didn't mean to. I have even rebooted, with no luck. I checked Appearance preferences, and I can't select any options. It is all greyed out.
Mrokii - I should note that this is a netbook remix version of Lucid Lynx that I told, in the Login Window dialogue, to boot to normal Gnome since I hate the UNR interface
I see. Then I don't know what to do, I've never tried out the netboox-edition.
